#summary LPC313x DIP Development Board

Designed to interface electronics to PCs via a High Speed USB interface.

Design Files are available in [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/source/browse/trunk/Current_Designs/LPC313x-DIP-Board SVN].

* Status * : 2009-10-04 - board was prototyped and is now undergoing testing.  Aim is for a November release.

== Features ==

 * Based on [http://www.nxp.com/ NXP] [http://www.standardics.nxp.com/products/lpc3000/lpc313x.lpc314x.lpc315x/ LPC313x]
 * USB Device/Host/OTG Modes supported
 * microSD connector in [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MicroSD SPI Mode]
 * SPI Flash - [http://www.atmel.com/dyn/resources/prod_documents/doc3500.pdf 2Mbyte] or [http://www.atmel.com/dyn/resources/prod_documents/doc3597.pdf 4Mbyte]
 * Miniature ARM JTAG connector [http://search.digikey.com/scripts/DkSearch/dksus.dll?Detail&name=S9009E-8-ND 16pin 8x2 0.05" (1.27mm)] - DBG pins unsupported
 * Choice of two USB connectors - [http://search.digikey.com/scripts/DkSearch/dksus.dll?Detail&name=H2959CT-ND USB-miniB] and/or [http://search.digikey.com/scripts/DkSearch/dksus.dll?Detail&name=151-1082-ND USB-A-Vertical]/[http://search.digikey.com/scripts/DkSearch/dksus.dll?Detail&name=151-1080-ND USB-A] switchable using a [http://focus.ti.com/docs/prod/folders/print/ts3usb221.html TS3USB221] IC.
 * RESET button, status LED, and 2mm jumpers for boot selection
